Package edu.ncsu.csc216.pack_scheduler.user.schedule

Class Schedule

java.lang.Object
edu.ncsu.csc216.pack_scheduler.user.schedule.Schedule
public class Schedule
extends java.lang.Object
A class representing a Student's schedule of classes. ALlows client to add, remove, and get Courses.
Author:
Daniel Nolting, Kelsey Hanser, Nick Bleuzen

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    Schedule()
    Constructs a Schedule with default "My Schedule" title and an empty ArrayList for schedule

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    boolean addCourseToSchedule​(Course course)
    Adds an existing Course to the Schedule
    boolean canAdd​(Course c)
    Checks if a course can be added to schedule by making sure that a course with that name is not already in schedule and it doesn't conflict with any other course in schedule
    int getScheduleCredits()
    Goes through list of Courses in schedule and adds up all the credits of the courses and returns the total credits If schedule is empty, returns 0
    java.lang.String[][] getScheduledCourses()
    Returns a 2D array of Courses on the schedule
    java.lang.String getTitle()
    Gets the title for the schedule
    boolean removeCourseFromSchedule​(Course course)
    Removes the specified Course from the Schedule
    void resetSchedule()
    Sets the schedule array to an empty ArrayList and sets the title to "My Schedule"
    void setTitle​(java.lang.String title)
    Sets the title of the Schedule

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • Schedule

      public Schedule()
      Constructs a Schedule with default "My Schedule" title and an empty ArrayList for schedule

  • Method Details

    • getScheduledCourses

      public java.lang.String[][] getScheduledCourses()
      Returns a 2D array of Courses on the schedule
      Returns:
      a String[][] containing each Course's name, section, title, and meeting string

    • setTitle

      public void setTitle​(java.lang.String title)
      Sets the title of the Schedule
      Parameters:
      title - the title to set
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if title is null

    • getTitle

      public java.lang.String getTitle()
      Gets the title for the schedule
      Returns:
      the title of the schedule

    • addCourseToSchedule

      public boolean addCourseToSchedule​(Course course)
      Adds an existing Course to the Schedule
      Parameters:
      course - the course to add
      Returns:
      true if the Course was successfully added
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the Course is already on the schedule or is conflicting with another Course

    • removeCourseFromSchedule

      public boolean removeCourseFromSchedule​(Course course)
      Removes the specified Course from the Schedule
      Parameters:
      course - the Course to remove from the schedule
      Returns:
      true if the Course was successfully removed and false if the specified Course is not on the Schedule

    • resetSchedule

      public void resetSchedule()
      Sets the schedule array to an empty ArrayList and sets the title to "My Schedule"

    • getScheduleCredits

      public int getScheduleCredits()
      Goes through list of Courses in schedule and adds up all the credits of the courses and returns the total credits If schedule is empty, returns 0
      Returns:
      total credits of all courses in schedule

    • canAdd

      public boolean canAdd​(Course c)
      Checks if a course can be added to schedule by making sure that a course with that name is not already in schedule and it doesn't conflict with any other course in schedule
      Parameters:
      c - Course to be checked
      Returns:
      true if c can be added, false if not or if c is null
